keyPolicies.policyDescription: Scotland is on a path to becoming a zero-emissions country, five years ahead of the rest of the UK, making our voice and values heard in Europe and on the international stage.

SNP is the only party to understand the needs and wants of the people of Airdrie & Shotts, standing up to NHS Lanarkshire for Monklands Hospital, with support from Alex Neil MSP and other Scottish Government members.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election will be close and every vote will count.

issues.brexitEurope: The Brexit shambles shows that whether you are leave or remain, Westminster has failed Scotland.
issues.environment: Scotland is on a path to becoming a zero-emissions country, five years ahead of the rest of the UK, making our voice and values heard in Europe and on the international stage.
issues.government: Westminster is completely broken. We need to send strong SNP MPs to Westminster to make sure Scotland's voice is heard.
issues.health: The SNP is the only party to understand the needs and wants of the people of Airdrie & Shotts, standing up to NHS Lanarkshire for Monklands Hospital.

community.content: Locally, the SNP is the only party to understand the needs and wants of the people of Airdrie & Shotts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have held more surgeries from Holytown to Harthill, Newmains to Greengairs and dealt with more constituency cases than my predecessor. It is because of my hard work across this constituency for local people that Jonathan Abernethy-Barky, a local Minister in Shotts, has chosen to back my re-election campaign.

politicalExperience.achievements: Opened offices in Shotts and Airdrie, held more surgeries, dealt with more constituency cases than predecessor.

contactInformation.address: Airdrie & Shotts SNP BRANCH, PO BOX 8768, Airdrie, ML6 8JD

endorsements.endorsement: A local Minister in Shotts has chosen to back Neil Gray's re-election campaign.

examples: In this election, you have an opportunity to re-elect an MP who has dealt with 11,500 cases and 8,000 constituents.
Scotland is on a path to becoming a zero-emissions country, five years ahead of the rest of the UK.
The Brexit shambles shows that whether you are leave or remain, Westminster has failed Scotland.
The SNP is the only party to understand the needs and wants of the people of Airdrie & Shotts, standing up to NHS Lanarkshire for Monklands Hospital.
Locally, the SNP is the only party to understand the needs and wants of the people of Airdrie & Shotts.
Scotland is on a path to becoming a zero-emissions country, five years ahead of the rest of the UK, making our voice and values heard in Europe and on the international stage.
The Brexit shambles shows that whether you are leave or remain, Westminster has failed Scotland.
We need to send strong SNP MPs to Westminster to make sure Scotland's voice is heard and that whichever of these men is in power, we hold them to account.

personalStories.story: I have held more surgeries from Holytown to Harthill, Newmains to Greengairs and dealt with more constituency cases than my predecessor.

examples: Jonathan Abernethy-Barky, a local Minister in Shotts, has chosen to back Neil Gray's re-election campaign.
The Brexit shambles shows that whether you are leave or remain, Westminster has failed Scotland.
The TV election coverage makes it appear that there is a false choice Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn. Neither of whom are up to the job.
The Brexit shambles shows that whether you are leave or remain, Westminster has failed Scotland.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: My hard work across this constituency for local people.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: Extended work with local MPs and councillors.

examples: I have opened offices in Shotts and Airdrie and employ local staff.
